text:
```tsx www.numberproxy.com/client/src/components/ServiceDemo.tsx:35-52
// Excerpt from: const curbsideSteps
  {
    title: "Setup Shared Number",
    icon: <Phone className="h-8 w-8" />,
    description: "Create a proxy for pickup notifications",
    stepNumber: 1,
  },
  {
    title: "Add Recipients",
    icon: <Shield className="h-8 w-8" />,
    description: "Connect family phones for notifications",
    stepNumber: 2,
  },
  {
    title: "Use for Pickups",
    icon: <MessageSquare className="h-8 w-8" />,
    description: "Everyone gets order status updates",
    stepNumber: 3,
  },
```
Come up with better titles and descriptions for these steps

Certainly! Here are some revised titles and descriptions to make the steps clearer and more engaging:

1. **Title:** "Create a Shared Number"
   **Description:** "Generate a unique phone number to receive pickup notifications from multiple sources."

2. **Title:** "Connect Family Phones"
   **Description:** "Link family members' phones to ensure everyone receives important order updates."

3. **Title:** "Track Order Status"
   **Description:** "Stay informed with real-time updates on your pickup status, sent to all connected devices."

These revised titles and descriptions aim to be more concise and informative while maintaining the original intent of each step.
